title: Sawbones: Dr. Oz
description:
There are many people who have been recurring characters on Sawbones. Pliny the Elder. Charlie. But few so notorious as Dr. Mehmet Oz, now running for the U.S. Senate. This isn’t a commentary on his political fitness; just an examination of his history of questionable medical advice and pop-science claims.

CW: Discussion of dieting and weight loss

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers https://taxpayers.bandcamp.com/
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin & Dr. Sydnee McElroy)
